name: Grinoir
description:
Made in 2 weeks for the "A Game By Its Cover 2022" Jam!

"Summon and take care of your own group of little demons and send them to make mischief around the neighborhood!"

Controls:
WASD to move, M to use mischief power, R to reset level.
D-pad to move, A to use mischief power, Y to reset level.

Credits:
Grinoir cartridge art and game inspiration: https://twitter.com/fvsegura
Terrain & character sprites by Kenney - https://www.kenney.nl/assets
Controller sprites by https://twitter.com/hyohnoo
Ritual circle sprite by Limezu - https://limezu.itch.io/
Sound effects by myself, 8-bit sound effects - B Gamer - https://www.youtube.com/@bgamer9266,  Gaming Sound Effects Library - https://www.youtube.com/@gamingsoundeffectslibrary7957 , Noise Top - https://www.youtube.com/@noisetop8597 , Brand Name Audio - https://www.youtube.com/@brandnameaudio and CoolSoundFX - https://www.youtube.com/@coolsoundfx6586, Music & Sounds Effect Library -https://www.youtube.com/@MusicSoundsEffectLibrary
